snippet.title: The Thing Remastered: Release Trailer | PC Gaming Show: Most Wanted 2024
snippet.description:
From creative minds at Nightdive Studios comes a meticulous overhaul of one of PC Gaming’s lost treasures. The Thing Remastered returns players to the frozen wilderness of Antarctica, as the head of a team dispatched to investigate the events of John Carpenter’s landmark horror film. The remaster includes new features like dynamic lighting and specular mapping, along with an advanced trust/fear interface. And it’s available to buy right now. Surprise! 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2958970/The_Thing_Remastered/
